dialogs: You approach the Student. She says: 'I'm waiting for my bus. In the meanwhile, I'm working on this puzzle but I can't seem to solve it. Want to help me?'
It's a tough puzzle. Want to help again?
Hmm... I don't think that's it.
Nice job. I don't have much, but I found this on the ground earlier. You can have it.
I hope my bus gets here soon. I have to study.
